text: Hianagi Ra Anumzamo'a harfa sondia kna huno nagrane mani'ne. E'ina hu'negu nagri'ma nazeri haviza hunaku'ma nehaza vahe'mo'za Agri avuga tanafa hu'za nemase'za nagrira nazeri nagate'oregahaze. E'ina'ma hania zamo hanige'za zamagazegu nehanageno, havi zamagima erisaza zamo'a vagaoreno mevava huno vugahie.
